name: Silium OS
description:
Endings in this game:

  • BA5:  Sentience [NO GAME FOR THIS ENDING YET, YOU COULD MAKE IT!]
  • BA4B:  Network Blackout [NO GAME FOR THIS ENDING YET, YOU COULD MAKE IT!]

Previous game:

  • BA3: Connect

Our series:

This game is part of Branching Corpses, a collaborative exquisite corpse of games. It is recommended that you start from the very first corpse and work your way through, but if you are here for the extra credits jam, it works as a stand-alone story (with one other game you might need to play, which will be linked to directly in the game.)

The game:

Status: Incomplete

Source code and assets available from GitHub.

Music by Devynn LaShure, Echo Blue Music
https://www.echobluemusic.com

Additional music by adriendittrick
